TopicTitle: Space Shuttle System Mod feels incomplete without Canadarm and Space Shuttle Pack

Articles.Content:
The space shuttle system mod is a cool mod but honestly i really miss the Canadarm and wish it would work it could use magnet really wish it was revived and fixed to work for 1.12X. I also think another mod that is unique and wish it was revived as well is the space shuttle pack made from Mike-NZ not sure what happened to him but the mod Space Shuttle Pack on SpaceDock  is unique because you could actually see stuff inside the cockpit transparent unlike the space shuttle system which the windows are black or unless one day someone adds an addon for it really wish these mods were revived.

 

Edited October 16, 2023 by Touhou_Flandre
